# 1902 Swarthmore Quakers football team

The 1902 Swarthmore Quakers football team was an American football team that represented Swarthmore College as an independent during the 1902 college football season. The team compiled a 6â€“6 record and outscored opponents by a total of 141 to 127. George H. Brooke was the head coach.
